name.baseName: Liquid Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitors (LAEC) Scrap ; Aluminum Powder ; Used Capacitors
液态铝电解电容器 (LAEC) 报废 ; 铝粉 ; 使用过的电容器

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described industrial process pertains to the recycling of Liquid Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitors (LAEC) into aluminum powder. The obtained aluminum powder can potentially be reused in various manufacturing processes where high-grade aluminum is requisite, such as in the production of new electronic components, aerospace materials, and other high-precision aluminum applications.
该工业过程涉及将液态铝电解电容器（LAEC）回收成铝粉。所得铝粉可潜在地重新用于各种需要高品质铝的制造过程，例如生产新的电子组件、航空材料以及其他高精度铝应用。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Literature published on 2022-11-15 in Literature The reference year of the elementary data (alumminum ingots, separator paper, tansport, electricity, and water) is around 2016 and qcruired from the Gabi database (Version: 10.6.1.35)

文献发表于2022-11-15，文献中 The reference year of the elementary data (alumminum ingots, separator paper, tansport, electricity, and water) is around 2016 and qcruired from the Gabi database (Version: 10.6.1.35)

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process pertains to the recycling of Liquid Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitors (LAEC) into aluminum powder. The obtained aluminum powder can potentially be reused in various manufacturing processes where high-grade aluminum is requisite, such as in the production of new electronic components, aerospace materials, and other high-precision aluminum applications.
该工业过程涉及将液态铝电解电容器（LAEC）回收成铝粉。所得铝粉可潜在地重新用于各种需要高品质铝的制造过程，例如生产新的电子组件、航空材料以及其他高精度铝应用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The material information and performance parameters of the three types of AECs are from the investigated manufacturer. Moreover, through the field research of several factories in the AEC industry, the original data on aluminum blank foil fabrication (made from aluminum ingots), anode/cathode foil fabrication (made from aluminum blank foil), and capacitor fabrication were obtained. Due to technical confidentiality, the LCI data of the fabrication of the cathode foil for PHAECs cannot be obtained directly from the supplier. Therefore, the manufacturing LCI of aluminum cathode foil in PHAECs is adjusted according to the coating process data of cathode foil of PAECs, considering their similarity. In the transportation stage, the data of the main raw materials from the material origin to the capacitor manufacturer and the data of the manufactured capacitor products from the manufacturer to the customers are from the supply chain system of the manufacturer. The energy consumption in the use stage is calculated based on the physical equations and the electrical parameters of the AECs. To ensure the completeness of the analysis, the data of the end-of-life stage is obtained based on the analysis and calculation.The reference year of the elementary data is around 2016. The elementary data (i.e., aluminum ingots, separator paper, transport, electricity, and water) are acquired from the Gabi database (Version: 10.6.1.35). In addition, some background data, including 3, 4-ethylene dioxythiophene (EDOT), ammonium adipate, ammonium citrate, etc., are not available in the Gabi database. They are estimated based on the chemical reactions with the material preparation process from the existing raw materials in the Gabi database. The data on the preparation process of the dispersive solution (PEDOT:PSS, 1%wt) for PHAECs' fabrication are scaled from the lab data. The detailed LCI data of the three types of AEC and unit impact of the substance flow is provided in Sheets 5–7 and Sheet 2 of Supporting Info B.

三种 AEC 的材料信息和性能参数均来自被调查的制造商。此外，通过对 AEC 行业的几家工厂进行实地调研，获得了铝坯箔制造（由铝锭制成）、阳极/阴极箔制造（由铝坯箔制成）和电容器制造的原始数据。由于技术保密原因，无法直接从供应商处获得 PHAEC 阴极箔制造的 LCI 数据。因此，考虑到两者的相似性，根据 PAECs 阴极箔的涂层工艺数据调整 PHAECs 阴极铝箔的制造 LCI。在运输阶段，主要原材料从材料产地到电容器制造商的数据以及电容器制成品从制造商到客户的数据均来自制造商的供应链系统。使用阶段的能耗是根据 AEC 的物理方程和电气参数计算得出的。为确保分析的完整性，在分析和计算的基础上获得报废阶段的数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhang, C., Zheng, Y., Jing, J., Liu, Y. & Huang, H. A comparative LCA study on aluminum electrolytic capacitors: From liquid-state electrolyte, solid-state polymer to their hybrid. J. Clean. Prod. 375, (2022).

Zhang, C., Zheng, Y., Jing, J., Liu, Y. & Huang, H. A comparative LCA study on aluminum electrolytic capacitors: From liquid-state electrolyte, solid-state polymer to their hybrid. J. Clean. Prod. 375, (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the dataset, attention should be paid to the reference year of the elementary data, which is around 2016, and derived from the Gabi database (Version: 10.6.1.35). Users should ensure that this data is compatible with their assessment period and methodological frameworks. In cases where the data for certain components (e.g., cathode foil in PHAECs) are adjusted due to technical confidentiality, users should be aware of the assumptions and adjustments made. For the transportation and use stages, users must consider the specific supply chain system of the manufacturer and the energy consumption calculated from the physical equations and the electrical parameters of the AECs. The end-of-life stage data should be incorporated into the life cycle assessment to ensure completeness. For any materials not available in the Gabi database, such as EDOT and ammonium salts, estimations are made based on chemical reactions and users should treat these with caution.

使用数据集时，应关注基本数据的参考年份，约为2016年，来源于Gabi数据库（版本：10.6.1.35）。用户应确保此数据与其评估周期和方法论框架兼容。在某些组件（例如PHAECs中的阴极箔）的数据由于技术保密而进行调整的情况下，使用者应意识到所做的假设和调整。对于运输和使用阶段，用户必须考虑制造商特定的供应链系统和从AECs的物理方程式和电参数计算的能耗。为了确保分析的完整性，应将生命周期终端阶段数据纳入生命周期评估。对于Gabi数据库中没有的任何材料，如EDOT和铵盐，都是基于化学反应进行估算，用户应慎重对待。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Mixture of plastic and paper with electrolyte

exchange.generalComment: Mixture of plastic and paper with electrolyte
